price: Ka sε: “Yɛn Wura Nyankopͻn bεboa yεn nyinaa ano abom na afei Ɔde nokorε no abu yεn ntam atεn. Ɔne Otemmufoͻ Nokwafoͻ no, na Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no“.
arabic: قُلۡ يَجۡمَعُ بَيۡنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفۡتَحُ بَيۡنَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُوَ ٱلۡفَتَّاحُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul yajmaʿu baynanā rabbunā thumma yaftaḥu baynanā bil-ḥaqi wahuwa al-fatāḥu al-ʿalīmu
